description: Standard message format for all data collectors. All metric values are floats.

field_definitions.message_id: UUID v4 string, auto-generated per message
field_definitions.timestamp: Unix timestamp (float), auto-generated at message creation
field_definitions.device_id: String identifier for the source device or collector instance
field_definitions.source: String identifier for the collector type (e.g., 'local', 'wikipedia', 'mobile')
field_definitions.metrics: List of MetricEntry objects, each with a metric_name (string), metric_value (float), and unit (string)
field_definitions.unit: Short string describing the measurement unit (e.g. '%', 'MB', '°C'). Empty string if dimensionless.
